title: Mary Lou McDonald – 2022 Comments on the Resignation of Liz Truss
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Mary Lou McDonald, the President of Sinn Fein, on 20 October 2022.
content:
Forty-five days of chaos and dysfunction at the heart of the Tory Party has ended with the resignation of Liz Truss.
